greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence related to factorizations and prime signatures: a(1) = 1; for n>1, a(n) = A057567(n) - 2*A001055(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: fcnt(n, m) = {local(s); s=0; if(n == 1, s=1, fordiv(n, d, if(d > 1 & d <= m, s=s+fcnt(n/d, d)))); s}
A001055(n) = fcnt(n, n) \\ This function from _Michael B. Porter_, Oct 29 2009
results.author: _Alford Arnold_, Jul 18 2007
